entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
